code: import Post from"../post/Post";import"./posts.scss";import{useQuery}from"@tanstack/react-query";import{makeRequest}from"../../axios";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Posts=_ref=>{let{userId}=_ref;const{isLoading,error,data}=useQuery(["posts"],()=>makeRequest.get("/posts?userId="+userId).then(res=>{return res.data;}));return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"posts",children:error?"Something went wrong!":isLoading?"loading":data.map(post=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Post,{post:post},post.id))});};export default Posts;
